title: Category not Currently Available
body:
I just downloaded the new client beta and for some reason, although i'm level 30, it is not allowing me to play anything other than blind pick and ARAM.  I tried restarting my client and computer and all but i don't want to reinstall league(my internet is terrible and would take days).  Is there anyway to fix this or deactivate the new client?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: I tried the full repair with no results, but relogged in and everything was fine so think that doing a full repair works!

So i was using the new client with this issue occuring but right clicking the icon on the desktop you can open legacy client (older version) and can play any game instead of only normal blind and aram. Just wanted to let anyone know that looks this up and continues to have a problem as I did.
With the full repair then restarting ur pc it worked for me in the new client.
Have the same issue for a long time now.

BUMP

I have this current same issue, but I have viable internet speeds. Connection not an issue and I repaired the client to no avail. Is this a client issue?

We've seen this issue crop up if there are issues with missing or corrupt assets in your client. You can run a quick repair by hitting the options button (cog in top-right corner) and hit the 'Initiate Full Repair' button.

Let me know if this worked or not!
For me it didn't work at all ):
